name: You have confirmed; your partner needs to confirm
body:
Dear ((first name)) ((last name))

Your ((partner)) needs to confirm((paysFees?? and pay for)) your joint application. They have been sent an email asking them to confirm your joint application((paysFees?? and pay for it)). They should do this by ((date of response)).   
  
When they have confirmed((paysFees?? and paid)), then the application will be submitted. 

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: Your ((partner)) needs to confirm your ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership))
